ygData.msgSnippet: ... LOL, you shoulda seen the anti-Verant curses flying across guildsay from my gf when the guy announced it to the rest of the guild. Oh well, she s a
ygData.messageBody:
>From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lute of the Gypsy Princess un-nerfed? DOUBLE the ef
>fect?!
>Date: Mon, 11 Oct 1999 17:56:01 -0600
>
>45 a tic?? I would be highly suspect of that. That is far too powerful
>(i.e. too good to be true). Clerics everywhere would blow a gasket if they
>heard about that.
>
>Desmei Sightblinder
>Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)

LOL, you shoulda seen the anti-Verant curses flying across guildsay from my
gf when the guy announced it to the rest of the guild. Oh well, she's a
pottymouth. =)

says to the guild, "I'm deleting this character and making a bard!!!"

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
